titles.title: A resolution to reaffirm cargo preference policy.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4637)
Referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 4/19/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that: (1) all Federal agencies administer their programs to ensure they are in maximum compliance with the intent and purpose of all cargo reservation laws and regulations of the Maritime Administration; and (2) the Maritime Administration closely and strictly monitor cargoes subject to reservation laws.
